data.name: BuddyNotificationEmailBody
data.value:
Hi,

{0}({1}) has added you as a buddy in Guardian for receiving SOS notifications and Tracking.
If you wish not to receive notifications for this user, click below link to unsubscribe
{2}

Thanks,
Guardian Team
**This email is sent from an unmonitored alias.**

data.name: BuddyNotificationEmailSubject
data.value: Buddy addition in Guardian for {0}({1})

data.name: BuddyNotificationSMSBody
data.value: {0}({1}) added you as a buddy in Guardian App. To unsubscribe, click {2}

data.name: EmailGroupValidationMsgTmp
data.value:
Hi,

Please click the below link to validate your Guardian group association.

Validation Link: {2}/Verification.aspx?V=2&key={0}&pr={1}&et=G

Thanks,
Guardian Team
**This email is sent from an unmonitored alias.**

data.name: EmailGroupValidationSubj
data.value: Activate your Group validation for Guardian

data.name: EmailMarshalValidationMsgTmp
data.value:
Hi,

Please click the bollowing link to confirm yourself as Guardian group marshal.

Validation Link: {2}/Verification.aspx?V=2&key={0}&pr={1}&et=M

Thanks,

Guardian Team

**This email is sent from an unmonitored alias.**

data.name: EmailMarshalValidationSubj
data.value: Guardian marshal confirmation

data.name: EmailMessage
data.value:
Hello,

{name} (Mobile No {phone}) needs urgent help at {address}. Track at {tinyuri} and help urgently.

Thanks,

Guardian Team


**This email is sent from an unmonitored alias. If you can’t provide help, try reaching appropriate authorities for help.**

data.name: EmailSafeMessage
data.value:
Hello,

{name} (Mobile No {phone}) is safe now.

Thanks,
Guardian Team


**This email is sent from an unmonitored alias. If you can’t provide help, try reaching appropriate authorities for help.**

data.name: UnRegisterNotificationEmailBody
data.value:
Hi,

You have unregistered yourself from Guardian App. We have ensured to delete your profile from our servers.
Please be informed that Guardian works best when you use it as a registered user.

Thanks,
Guardian Team
**This email is sent from an unmonitored alias.**

data.name: UnRegisterNotificationEmailSubject
data.value: Profile unregistered in Guardian
